title: Academy Ekko hits people with a Cricket Bat.

replies.body: This skin teaches juvenile violence, by letting a boy use a cricket bat to hit people, but {{champion:104}} can't have a cigar

How is Riot going to make an OCE Skin, I mean really it has to cover the south Korean and phillipines etc culture and a few of the islands, as well as Australia. I mean the Asian culture and the Australian culture is so different and there's nothing that really binds them.
I think they should make 3. 1 for like island culture, one Asian and one Australian.
I think you're forgetting one other country...
that's an island like thing, stick it there
I have always thought of Cricket as an English sport despite our successes in playing it.
Yeah its an English sport 100%. OP must be high
Yeah but hitting people with a cricket bat is Australian.
Lol sorry that was pretty Racist. I don't know why I said this or even made this thread, I get ahead of myself sometimes.
| >:3 I win, 13/0/8 as tf, don't come near me :) you died |
You gotta know what a crumpet is to understand cricket!
